title: Fall foliage to be more ‘vibrant,’ last longer this year in Ontario
summary: Fall 2025 isn't officially here yet but the season's foliage is arriving earlier than usual and experts predict it will be even more beautiful in some areas.

title: Renewing your mortgage? What the Bank of Canada’s rate cut means for you
summary: According to the Bank of Canada’s research, 60 per cent of all Canadian mortgages will be up for renewal in 2025 and 2026. What does the most recent rate cut mean for you?

title: COMMENTARY: Canadians aren’t mad at America anymore. We’re hurt, suspicious, and moving on
summary: New Ipsos data reveals a nation that has moved from anger to acceptance, with six in 10 Canadians saying they can never trust the United States the same way again.

title: B.C. Lions roar in Calgary, down Stampeders 52-23
summary: B.C. Lions quarterback Nathan Rourke's legs were as lethal as his arm Friday when he broke a vintage CFL record.

title: Blue Jays to move pitcher Jose Berrios to bullpen
summary: Toronto Blue Jays right-hander Jose Berrios is moving to the bullpen, manager John Schneider told reporters following Friday's 20-1 loss to the Kansas City Royals.
